item.title: Mar 26
item.description: Prompt: Act as if you were a developer, write a post on how to stay productive by using nowaday technologies Mar 26 [!tldr] Mar 26 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize As a busy programmer and project manager, I know how important it is to be efficient and focused to get things done. Here are some nowaday technologies that can help you stay productive: Productivity software: There are several productivity software tools out there, such as Trello, Asana, Monday, and Monday.

item.title: Mar 25
item.description: Prompt: Act as if you were a professional web developer, write a blog post explaining why it is a good idea to use serverless architecture Mar 25 [!tldr] Mar 25 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize In today’s fast-paced technology world, where even small businesses are embracing the cloud and adopting the latest trends, the concept of serverless architecture has gained immense popularity. Let me explain why it is a good idea to use serverless architecture for your web development projects.
